rComments: I ENJOYED this class. we had a fair amount of reading and worksheets due once a week. we had 3 papers. one midterm. a final. and a group project. the class is largely discussion based. she is very engaging and is a fair grader. she provided study guides and is very approachable. I would definitely recommend it was my favorite class last quarter

Really loved this class! Lectures were always clear. We had worksheets due every week so be prepared to read but its worth it bc the readings were really good. I can say that I have a new perspective of the world bc of this class, it brought a lot of awareness to issues I never acknowledged in the past. One of the best classes I've taken
This class had a lot of work so get ready. I do NOT recommend. However, sitting in lecture was interesting.

I absolutely love this professor and this class changed my whole outlook on, well, everything! She takes you on a journey through the frameworks in which we see the world. I took this class to satisfy a GE and it was hard work for a STEM major like me so I took it passno pass. But I definitely recommend this class. It's a UCSC must
